\documentclass[english,autodetect-engine, dvi=dvipdfmx, ja=standard]{bxjsarticle}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{luainputenc}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\begin{itemize}
\item 12変数 ($D_{t},W_{t},N_{t},N_{t}^{H},N_{t}^{S},MC_{t},C_{t},C_{t}^{H},C_{t}^{S},Y_{t},R_{t}^{N}$,
$\Pi_{t}$):
\begin{align*}
W_{t} & =\Xi(N_{t}^{H})^{\varphi}(C_{t}^{H})^{\sigma}\\
C_{t}^{H} & =W_{t}N_{t}^{H}+\frac{\tau^{D}}{\lambda}D_{t}\\
W_{t} & =\Xi(N_{t}^{S})^{\varphi}(C_{t}^{S})^{\sigma}\\
1 & =\mathbb{E}_{t}\left[\beta\left(\frac{C_{t+1}^{S}}{C_{t}^{S}}\right)^{-\sigma}\frac{R_{t}^{N}}{\Pi_{t+1}}\right]
\end{align*}
\begin{align*}
W_{t} & =(1-\alpha)MC_{t}N_{t}^{-\alpha}\\
D_{t}= & Y_{t}-\frac{\eta_{P}}{2}\left(\frac{\Pi_{t}}{\Pi}-1\right)^{2}Y_{t}-W_{t}N_{t}
\end{align*}
\begin{align*}
\eta_{P}\frac{\Pi_{t}}{\Pi}\left(\frac{\Pi_{t}}{\Pi}-1\right)=\psi_{P}\left(MC_{t}-(1+\tau^{S})(1-1/\psi_{P})\right)\\
+\beta\eta_{P}\mathbb{E}_{t}\left[\left(\frac{C_{t+1}^{S}}{C_{t}^{S}}\right)^{-\sigma}\frac{Y_{t+1}}{Y_{t}}\frac{\Pi_{t+1}}{\Pi}\left(\frac{\Pi_{t+1}}{\Pi}-1\right)\right]
\end{align*}
\end{itemize}
\begin{align*}
C_{t} & =\lambda C_{t}^{H}+(1-\lambda)C_{t}^{S}\\
N_{t} & =\lambda N_{t}^{S}+(1-\lambda)N_{t}^{S}\\
Y_{t} & =C_{t}+\frac{\eta_{P}}{2}\left(\frac{\Pi_{t}}{\Pi}-1\right)^{2}Y_{t}\\
Y_{t} & =N_{t}^{1-\alpha}\\
\frac{R_{t}^{N}}{R^{N}} & =\left(\frac{\Pi_{t}}{\Pi}\right)^{\phi}\exp(-m_{t})\\
m_{t} & =\rho_{m}m_{t-1}+e_{t}^{m}
\end{align*}

\begin{itemize}
\item 定常状態
\begin{align*}
W & =\Xi(N^{H})^{\varphi}(C^{H})^{\gamma}\\
C^{H} & =WN^{H}+\frac{\tau^{D}}{\lambda}D\\
W & =\Xi(N^{S})^{\varphi}(C^{S})^{\gamma}\\
1 & =\mathbb{E}_{t}\left[\beta\frac{R^{N}}{\Pi}\right]
\end{align*}
\begin{align*}
W & =(1-\alpha)MCN^{-\alpha}\\
D=Y & -WN
\end{align*}
\[
MC=(1+\tau^{S})(1-1/\psi_{P})
\]
\end{itemize}
\begin{align*}
C & =\lambda C^{H}+(1-\lambda)C^{S}\\
N & =\lambda N^{H}+(1-\lambda)N^{S}\\
Y & =C\\
Y & =N^{1-\alpha}
\end{align*}

\begin{itemize}
\item 対数線形近は以下である $d_{t}=(D_{t}-D)/Y$:
\begin{align*}
w_{t} & =\varphi n_{t}^{H}+\gamma c_{t}^{H}\\
\frac{C^{H}}{Y}c_{t}^{H} & =\frac{WN^{H}}{Y}(w_{t}+n_{t}^{H})+\frac{\tau^{D}}{\lambda}d_{t}\\
w_{t} & =\varphi n_{t}^{S}+\gamma c_{t}^{S}\\
r_{t}^{N} & =\mathbb{E}_{t}\left[\pi_{t+1}\right]+(\gamma+\kappa)\mathbb{E}_{t}\left[\Delta c_{t+1}^{S}\right]-\kappa\mathbb{E}_{t}\left[\Delta n_{t+1}^{S}\right]
\end{align*}
\begin{align*}
\kappa & =\xi\left[1-\frac{1-\gamma}{1+\varphi}\frac{WN^{S}}{C^{S}}\right]^{-1}(1-\alpha)MC\frac{N^{S}/N}{C^{S}/Y}\xi\\
 & =\xi\left[1-\frac{1-\gamma}{1+\varphi}(1-\alpha)MC\frac{N^{S}/N}{C^{S}/Y}\xi\right]^{-1}
\end{align*}
\begin{align*}
w_{t}= & mc_{t}+a_{t}-\alpha n_{t}=mc_{t}+y_{t}-n_{t}\\
d_{t}\equiv & \frac{D_{t}-D}{Y_{t}}=\frac{Y_{t}}{Y}\{1-\frac{\eta_{P}}{2}\left(\frac{\Pi_{t}}{\Pi}-1\right)^{2}\}-\frac{W_{t}N_{t}}{Y}-\frac{D}{Y}\\
 & =\frac{Y_{t}}{Y}\{1-\frac{\eta_{P}}{2}\left(\frac{\Pi_{t}}{\Pi}-1\right)^{2}\}-\frac{(1-\alpha)MC_{t}Y_{t}}{Y}-\frac{D}{Y}\\
 & =\frac{Y_{t}}{Y}\left\{ 1-\left(\pi_{t}\right)^{2}-(1-\alpha)MC_{t}\right\} -\frac{D}{Y}\\
= & (1+y_{t})\left\{ 1-(1-\alpha)MC(1+mc_{t})\right\} -\frac{D}{Y}\\
= & (1+y_{t})\left\{ 1-(1-\alpha)MC-(1-\alpha)MCmc_{t}\right\} -\frac{D}{Y}\\
= & -(1-\alpha)MCmc_{t}+(1+y_{t})\left\{ 1-(1-\alpha)MC\right\} -(1-(1-\alpha)MC)\\
= & -(1-\alpha)MCmc_{t}+(1-(1-\alpha)MC)y_{t}\\
= & y_{t}-(1-\alpha)MC(mc_{t}+y_{t})\\
= & y_{t}-(1-\alpha)MC(w_{t}+n_{t})\\
= & (1-MC)y_{t}-(1-\alpha)MCw_{t}\\
\pi_{t}= & \frac{\psi_{p}(\varphi+\gamma)MC}{\eta_{p}}mc_{t}+\beta\mathbb{E}_{t}\left[\pi_{t+1}\right]
\end{align*}
\[
d_{t}=-(1-\alpha)MCw_{t}+(1-MC)y_{t}
\]
\end{itemize}
\begin{align*}
c_{t} & =\lambda\frac{C^{H}}{C}c_{t}^{H}+(1-\lambda)\frac{C^{S}}{C}c_{t}^{S}\\
n_{t} & =\lambda\frac{N^{H}}{N}n_{t}^{H}+(1-\lambda)\frac{N^{S}}{N}n_{t}^{S}\\
y_{t} & =c_{t}\\
y_{t} & =(1-\alpha)n_{t}\\
r_{t}^{N} & =\phi\pi_{t}-m_{t}\\
m_{t} & =\rho_{m}m_{t-1}+e_{t}^{m}
\end{align*}
\end{document}
